channel.title: Loop Architectural Materials
channel.description: Design & technical partner to the Arizona Architecture and Design community, Loop Architectural Materials represents leading brands in contract furniture, acoustics, and architectural/interior design finishes.

item.title: Introducing FACT - Folding Acoustical Ceiling Tiles
item.description: What sets FACT apart is ease. Ease for the specifier and the installer. Greater ease and wellbeing for people in the space. A product that’s…
item.content:encoded:
What sets FACT apart is ease. Ease for the specifier and the installer. Greater ease and wellbeing for people in the space. A product that’s easier on the environment. An acoustic solution that’s easy to love.

Explore Ceiling Tiles from FACT

Simplicity in Specification

FACT acoustic tiles are available in unique shapes and four easy neutrals. Just fold and drop into your ceiling grid to instantly improve your space. Specify myriad colors using kvadrat’s Divina MD collection.

American Made, Internationally Designed, Sustainably Minded

FACT is proud to be a part of the Sweetwater, Tennessee community and supporting small town manufacturing. Collaborations with 13&9 Design, Paul Jackson, and Peter Dahmen inform the design.

With a deep commitment to sustainable practices, FACT helps you create healthier, stress-free spaces that are better for people and the environment.

FACT tiles are made from PET felt that contains 60% pre-consumer recycled content. You can recycle 100% of your FACT products. Even our hardware is made of PET.

We produce almost zero waste in making FACT products. Lean manufacturing at our factory also ensures minimal use of natural resources.

Don't Forget the Walls!

Each wall tile is designed with a beveled edge adding both dimensionality and modularity to the design.

Explore Wall Tiles from FACT

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of FACT. If you have any questions, need a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Introducing the Topo Collection from RBW
item.description: Exuding both elegance and warmth, Topo joins the simplicity of an elliptical glass globe with the organic texture of an innovative new…
item.content:encoded:
Exuding both elegance and warmth, Topo joins the simplicity of an elliptical glass globe with the organic texture of an innovative new material. The new sconce collection features two sizes in a selection of rich earth tones, emphasizing the warmth of the light as it illuminates the organic patterns of the backplate's surface.

Explore Topo @RBW

The First of Its Kind

As a unique addition to the lighting market, Topo is the first to feature an innovative composite material combining the strength and durability of cement with the flexibility of FSC and PEFC-certified wood.

Well Rounded

Five distinct color options and two sizes make Topo a versatile addition to a range of projects, with added dimming capabilities and leading energy efficiency.

Textural Appeal

The innovative backplate material evokes the familiar patterns and textures of terrazzo with an added organic warmth, while meeting the requirements to support the latest LEED certification.

Organic & Understated

The elliptical glass bulb and textures of the circular backplate join seamlessly to create a minimal and inviting appearance.

Configure Topo @RBW

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of RBW. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

item.title: New Acoustic Lighting Solutions from BuzziSpace
item.description: BuzziSpace has launched a new collection of acoustic lighting solutions that addresses the issue of excessive noise in spaces where people…
item.content:encoded:
BuzziSpace has launched a new collection of acoustic lighting solutions that addresses the issue of excessive noise in spaces where people work and socialize.

The collection includes three lighting designs: BuzziPebl, BuzziBurner, and BuzziSurf, each featuring integrated sound-absorbing materials that help to reduce echoes and noise.

These lighting solutions are designed with contemporary and decorative elements and come in warm, amorphous shapes that are of the moment. They’re designed to fit into all spaces from work to hospitality to home.

BuzziPebl

The BuzziPebl Light is a wall sconce that offers indirect accent lighting and can be wall-mounted or ceiling-suspended.

BuzziBurner

BuzziBurner features a cone-shaped shade that provides dimmable LED lighting and acoustic privacy.

BuzziSurf

BuzziSurf is an acoustic pendant light with an elongated surfboardish design and is available in a variety of shapes and sizes.

BuzziSpace offers a helpful, free downloadable BuzziSpace RT60 v3.0 app for iOS designed to measure the reverberation time of room acoustics. It allows you to easily simulate the impact BuzziSpace products would have on your space.

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of BuzziSpace. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Area Environments Spring Collection 2022
item.description: Spring is a beautiful season filled with freshness and rebirth. Our Spring 2022 Collection has us prepared and excited for the structure and…
item.content:encoded:
Spring is a beautiful season filled with freshness and rebirth. Our Spring 2022 Collection has us prepared and excited for the structure and rhythm of getting back some of our previous normal.

Explore The Spring Collection...

Our collection has been built around these ideas, with compositions made out of wood by Artist Anna Bailey, to folds of fabric and plaster by artist Jessy Wilson.

We look to the striking bold hues of Genevive Leopold’s gestural paintings for energy and rejoice at seeing the spring foliage and whimsical illustrations of Marta Cortese.

We also saved some new floral works from our artist Paz Irarrázaval to introduce to you this spring. Enjoy!

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Area Environmants. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Genrose Notes Collection
item.description: A Modern Porcelain Tile Notes is a unique collection that enlivens the traditional 8' × 8" tile with a modern linear pattern. Available in…
item.content:encoded:
A Modern Porcelain Tile

Notes is a unique collection that enlivens the traditional 8' × 8" tile with a modern linear pattern. Available in 6 colorful styles, Notes brings contemporary beauty and visual interest to any surface with its alluring pattern.

Explore The Notes Collection...

Versatile Beauty

The Notes collection is incredibly versatile, offering plenty of bold shades to choose from, as well as many neutral options. Notes will enhance a space in any of its eye-catching color combinations!

Need Samples?

Visit our showroom, or reach out to sales@looparch.com for binders, tile samples or detailed product information.

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Area Environmants. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Introducing the Print Collection
item.description: With high-performance LEDs enclosed in a unique, prismatic shade, RBW's new Print collection offers the classic globe, elevated. Its…
item.content:encoded:
With high-performance LEDs enclosed in a unique, prismatic shade, RBW's new Print collection offers the classic globe, elevated. Its striking surface, achieved by acclaimed designer Sylvain Willenz, is imprinted with a diamond texture that creates an understated, sparkling play of light.

Explore the Print Collection

The Print Collection was designed in collaboration with Sylvain Willenz, an award-winning, independent designer based in Brussels, Belgium. His furniture, lighting, and textile design is distinguished by its striking graphic quality, combining clarity of function with elegance of form. This celebrated approach is apparent in Print's visual coherence and refinement.

Offered in various finishes and fine-tuned for optimal light quality, Print’s versatile design works well across a range of applications—at home, in the workplace and in hospitality settings—indoors and outdoors.

Print's refined pattern and texture enhances the familiar globe as a pendant, sconce, or flush mount in two finishes and sizes.

Explore the Print Collection

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of RBW. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Introducing Atmosphera Versa & Versa 3D
item.description: Arktura's new Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D adaptive baffle systems bring almost any design vision for linear and undulating straight…
item.content:encoded:
Arktura's new Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D adaptive baffle systems bring almost any design vision for linear and undulating straight baffles to reality.

Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D offer fins that are fully tailorable to the needs of your project in Arktura's high performance acoustic Soft Sound material.

In addition to amazing configurability, Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D utilize a new rib and assembly system that incorporates standard T-Grid as a foundational structure.

Versa's new rib and assembly system provides several cost and performance benefits, including enhanced flexibility, ease-of-install, and sound-attenuating performance.

Explore Atmosphera Versa

With Versa 3D, use undulating linear baffles to create ceiling scapes that influence people's movement, impression, and memory of the space in a fun creative way. Provide your own surface design or work with the Arktura team to craft the ceiling’s flow.

Want to learn more about how Versa and Versa 3D can work for you? Watch Arktura's newest video to learn about the design flexibility Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D offer, and the exciting new opportunities for creative expression and acoustic control they can bring to your next project.

Explore Atmosphera Versa 3D

Loop carefully curates it’s stable of lines to bring you the newest, highest quality and most innovative products available for glass, furniture, flooring, wall coverings, architectural wood products, acoustics & lighting.

item.title: Offecct's New Jasmine Acoustic Panel
item.description: Solutions for creating good, sustainable sound environments in public spaces are becoming increasingly important. Offecct's new Soundwave…
item.content:encoded:
Solutions for creating good, sustainable sound environments in public spaces are becoming increasingly important.

Offecct's new Soundwave Jasmine Acoustic Panel restores calm and reduces noise in offices, restaurants and other meeting places. Designed by Offecct´s new designer Layla Mehdi Pour, Jasmine is inspired by nature's interplay between order and irregularity. The panel is shaped like a triangle and can be combined into various playful solutions.

When Layla Mehdi Pour designed Jasmine, she was inspired by natural elements that may seem irregular in their macro form, but in the details have a wonderful precision and regular structure. In this case, she started foremost from flowers and developed them into a concrete product with a playful character.

“I strived to capture nature´s poetic rhythm and mix it with more geometric, triangular shapes that can be combined in different ways and create new expressions and compositions,” she states.

Jasmine works well to increase speech intelligibility in rooms when used as a complement to an acoustic ceiling. They complement the ceiling well in the frequencies where the need for absorption usually lies.

Offecct offers a wide range of sound absorbing wall panels, designed by world-leading designers. The versatile collection Soundwave® not only provides a good acoustic environment, but also brings character to the interior.

The Jasmine acoustic panel is the result of the first collaboration between Italy-based product designer Layla Mehdi Pour and Offecct.

Explore Jasmine Acoustic Panel

Loop carefully curates it’s stable of lines to bring you the newest, highest quality and most innovative products available for glass, furniture, flooring, wall coverings, architectural wood products, acoustics & lighting.

item.title: Introducing: The Omni Collection
item.description: Endless Knot’s Aim is Simple. Create the highest quality rugs at every price point to elevate Interior Design, from corporate to retail, to…
item.content:encoded:
Endless Knot’s Aim is Simple.

Create the highest quality rugs at every price point to elevate Interior Design, from corporate to retail, to hospitality.

Endless Knot honors centuries-old traditions with their custom Tibetan hand-knotting process while catering to modern time-frames with additional on-demand options.

Featuring the Omni Collection

The Design is in the Details. If your project’s timeline doesn’t allow for a custom hand-knotted rug but you’re still looking for a piece to steal the show, the Omni Collection is the perfect solution. Featuring ready-to-ship rugs with various whimsical patterns, sheens, and textures that bring the “wow” factor into any space.

Explore the Omni Collection...

"Terrace" in Navy

Details

"Sellery" in Ash

Details

"Mansion-Hill" in Charcoal

Details

Want to Create a Design that is Entirely Your Own?

You can personalize one of our hand-knotted rugs, using our unique customization tool to adjust to your exact design specifications. Click on the image below to try it out.

Loop carefully curates it’s stable of lines to bring you the newest, highest quality and most innovative products available for glass, furniture, flooring, wall coverings, architectural wood products, acoustics & lighting.

item.title: Area Environments Collection
item.description: Area Environment's Fall 2019 Collection comes with announcements of new artists, new artwork by existing artists and new substrates. New…
item.content:encoded:
Area Environment's Fall 2019 Collection comes with announcements of new artists, new artwork by existing artists and new substrates.

New Artists

Charlotte Terrell – After receiving her degree in landscape architecture from the University of Georgia in 1980, Charlotte Terrell began work as a landscape architect for New York City Parks involving the restoration of 19th-century areas of Central Park and other historic landscapes.

Karen Margolis – Karen Margolis’ intricate mixed-media work has been exhibited internationally from Los Angeles to the Netherlands. Inspired by maps and the significance of the journey, she uses burning techniques to create a sense of lightness amidst density.

Matthew Kirk – Born in Arizona and raised in Wisconsin, Matthew Kirk now lives and works in Ridgewood, Queens, New York. Having developed his craft without formal training, Matthew creates his pieces using readily available supplies, often from the construction industry: sheet-rock and plywood are his base materials.

Paula Kovarik – Paula Kovarik received her BA in graphic design from Southern Illinois University at Carbondale. For over 25 years she was the creative director and owner of Shades of Gray, Inc., a graphic design studio.

Explore New Artists

New Artwork from Current Artists

Doug Glovaski – Black Vines

Domitilla Biondi – Dance

Domitilla Biondi – Flowering

Explore New Artwork

New Substrates

In our boldest introduction yet, Area is bringing two new substrates to the market. Scrim, a self-adhesive window fabric, provides a gorgeous, translucent solution for defining a space. And Embossed, a digitally structured, tactile wallpaper, enhancing the lines, brushstrokes, and other elements in the artwork. It will add a whole new dimension to your walls.

Scrim — a self-adhesive fabric that warmly dresses up your windows. allowing light to filter through while still providing privacy. Scrim is offered with a standard opacity level allowing light to filter through while still providing privacy. Our design team can work with you to customize the opacity level to meet your specific installation requirements.

Embossed — A new luxury wallcovering that brings sophistication to our collection of substrates. Through innovative technology, we are able to print and emboss simultaneously, creating a colorful, soft, and textural feel.

Explore Substrates

Custom Wallpaper

Just a reminder that Area's capabilities in implementing your custom designs are unparalleled. Your imagination is the limit!

Explore Custom Wall Coverings

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Area Environments wall coverings. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

item.title: New Bover Lighting
item.description: Announced at this year's Euroluce conference, Bover launched new outdoor and indoor collections featuring materials they had never worked…
item.content:encoded:
Announced at this year's Euroluce conference, Bover launched new outdoor and indoor collections featuring materials they had never worked with before.

See the new 2019 collections...

Mediterrània

The Mediterrània lamp is an ode to the Mediterranean breeze and smell. A soft wave of ribbon pays homage to our Mediterranean light; combining bright flashes with very warm beams, especially in the sunrise and sunset.

Explore the Mediterrania Collection...

Domita

Inspired by the existing large Dome pendant lights, Domita is a natural expansion of the line featuring smaller versions that allow for lighter and more dynamic spaces.

Explore the Dome Collection...

Mod

Seeking inspiration from nature, Mod is grouped to mimic clusters of flowers. With the goal of creative freedom, the petals of its "flowers" are fully customizable, and can use almost any material. Metal in smooth, perforated, or laser cut finishes is available as well as natural materials, such as wood panels, natural fibers, or sewn thread.

Explore the Mod Collection...

Even More

Bover's 2019 product page doesn't just feature new collections, it includes new lighting that builds on existing collections. See below for more beautiful lighting options from Bover.

Explore All Bover Collections...

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Bover Barcelona lighting. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, please don't hesitate to contact us.

item.title: RBW Monocle
item.description: Meet the newest sconce from Rich Brilliant Willing. As an update to their staples collection, Rich Brilliant Willing (RBW) is excited to…
item.content:encoded:
Meet the newest sconce from Rich Brilliant Willing.

As an update to their staples collection, Rich Brilliant Willing (RBW) is excited to announce an updated design for their Monocle sconce. A sleek, rotating light, with dimming control at the touch of a finger.

Explore Monocole...

The newly redesigned Monocle offers improved features and hardware. Touch controls allows cycling between three levels of light, on, and off. This ease of use, along with Monocle’s pleasantly round shape, make it an ideal lamp for a bedside or workstation. However, its durable and damp-rated design make it equality as suited for additional applications, like bathrooms and outdoor environments.

Monocle comes in five beautiful finishes, from bold Vert Clair to neutral tones like Black. Available to preorder now, and shipping in May 2019.

Browse Monocole...

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of RBW. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, please don't hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Babled
item.description: At the 2019 Stockholm Furniture & Light Fair, Offecct premiered their new original designs on the world stage. See Babled and other new…
item.content:encoded:
At the 2019 Stockholm Furniture & Light Fair, Offecct premiered their new original designs on the world stage. See Babled and other new furniture introduced by Offecct.

See all New Furniture from Offecct...

Babled

The craft-based work of celebrated French designer Emmanuel Babled has resulted in the easy chair Babled. What started out as a prototype in marble has, working with Offecct, been developed into commercial seating furniture.

Explore Babled...

Font

Font is a sofa system designed for Sweden's Nationalmuseum which originally opened in Stockholm in 1866, and was reinaugurated in 2018 after a five-year renovation. Going beyond this, Font is a sofa system will grow into different spaces far beyond the museum’s walls.

Explore Font...

Grandfield

The Grandfield sofa system by Christophe Pillet is a natural place for meetings, rest and socialising no matter the environment or context it is placed in. Soft and simple, it can be extended with platforms and sections to suit many needs.

Explore Grandfield...

Young

Young is a sofa and easy chair for urban spaces. When space is scarce, furniture needs to be able to deliver more than good looks – and this is exactly what the Young sofa and easy chair by British designer Michael Young do.

Explore Young...

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Offecct. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Arktura SoundBar
item.description: Arktura's newest system is an integrated acoustical baffle and lighting solution that provides great all-around performance in a single cost…
item.content:encoded:
Arktura's newest system is an integrated acoustical baffle and lighting solution that provides great all-around performance in a single cost-effective, versatile product.

Power is supplied through the suspension cables, simplifying install and removing the unsightly clutter of cords. Because it's made from Arktura Soft Sound acoustical material, SoundBar is capable of achieving NRC ratings of up to 1.15.

Explore SoundBar...

SoundBar is customizable from length, width, and depth, to Up, Down, or Duo lighting configurations. Available in a wide range of colors, including wood textures, they can easily be mixed and arranged as desired.

SoundBar was awarded the Best Surfacing Product of 2018 in Architectural Record's 2018 Record Product Awards!

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Arktura. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

item.title: Introducing Noble
item.description: We're excited to share Finium's all new line of wood cladding, the Noble collection. Inspired from real, centuries-old Canadian barn wood…
item.content:encoded:
We're excited to share Finium's all new line of wood cladding, the Noble collection.

Inspired from real, centuries-old Canadian barn wood, products from Finium's Noble collection easily create a bold and unique look. Each detail is inspired by beams and panels worn by centuries of time, creating a result that is both one-of-a-kind, and instantly familiar.

Explore the Noble Collection...

Finding inspiration has never been easier! Whether you're searching for something specific or out to browse for an upcoming project. Get design ideas for any space. Sorted by collection or type of space, here is a selection of Finium installation images to spark your imagination!

View Finium Inspiration Images...

item.title: Arktura's Award Season
item.description: Soundbar™ A Cost-Effective Way of Tackling Lighting, Noise Reduction, and Design Arktura is excited to release the SoundBar™ high…
item.content:encoded:
Soundbar™

A Cost-Effective Way of Tackling Lighting, Noise Reduction, and Design

Arktura is excited to release the SoundBar™ high performance acoustical baffle and lighting system and Architectural Record 2018 Products Award Winner!

This is their third consecutive year winning with their acoustical products. It's sleek, easy-to-install design illuminates spaces while delivering NRC ratings of up to 1.15 to give architects and designers complete control over their spaces.

SoundBar™ is available in an assortment of lengths, widths, and depths, in Up, Down, or Duo lighting configurations, and a wide range of colors, including wood textures. Easily mix and arrange units as desired to achieve an endless array of dynamic layouts.

Lean More About Soundbar™...

Browse all Acoustical Systems...

Vapor Graphic Perf

The Next Evolution of Customization for Standard Perforated Ceiling and Wall Panel Systems

Interior Design Magazine named Vapor® Graphic Perf® as winner in Materials, Treatments & Surfaces at the 2018 Best of Year Awards!

Vapor® Graphic Perf® turns Arktura's wall and ceiling panel system into one limitless canvas. It's the cost effective and customizable version of their standard grid panels and allows branding, photography and visual elements to be transferred into the perforated metal panels.

Its ease of install and compatibility with their Vertika wall channel and standard grid system makes it the best panel product of the year.

Read More About Vapor® Graphic Perf®...

item.title: Introducing Area Environments
item.description: Stunning Wall Art from Area Environments Decorative wall coverings that bring art into any space. We’re excited to introduce Area…
item.content:encoded:
Stunning Wall Art from Area Environments

Decorative wall coverings that bring art into any space.

We’re excited to introduce Area Environments, our newest manufacturer! Area Environments allows you to incorporate breathtaking artwork into any project, in the form of decorative wall coverings.

Area Environments works by partnering with a variety of artists who hand paint the original designs. These designs then get converted into large scale decorative wall coverings, created at the highest possible level of quality. Area Environments then supplies these mural and art wall coverings straight to your space.

Explore Area Environments...

Inspiration

Finding inspiration has never been easier! Whether you're searching for something specific or out to browse for an upcoming project. Get design ideas for any space. Sorted by artist, style, or color, here is a selection of wall installation images to spark your imagination!

View Inspiration Images...

item.title: Meet Pastille & Chip
item.description: Pastille Selected anodized finishes are available for the first time as custom finishing for the Pastille back plate in addition to the…
item.content:encoded:
Pastille

Selected anodized finishes are available for the first time as custom finishing for the Pastille back plate in addition to the offerings from the RBW Finish Library.

Learn more about RBW's custom lettering capabilities for Pastille that are available in 20 production days. Pricing will vary by quantity, please inquire for more details.

Explore Pastille..

Chip

Chip is a surface-mounted fixture with the familiar grooves that extend the surface area its light can reach. Scoring Chip’s clear, solid glass body and painted interior, the grooves also add a textural quality to its minimalist design.

Installation options include with or without a square mounting plate. Chip is suitable for installation as a bathroom vanity light or outdoors, as well as in foyers and corridors.

Explore Chip..

Also, RBW Revit Families are Now Available

RBW's collection of 3D BIM Models are now available for flexible placement during your planning process.

Visit Resource Library..

item.title: Vitis
item.description: In its first ever West Coast launch, Rich Brilliant Willing is proud to present their latest statement piece, Vitis, a dramatically draped…
item.content:encoded:
In its first ever West Coast launch, Rich Brilliant Willing is proud to present their latest statement piece, Vitis, a dramatically draped chandelier combining light, translucency and fluidity of form. Vitis is now on view for a limited run in San Francisco at the record shope, RS94109, on 835 Larkin Street.

Named after the Latin origin of vineyard, the vine-like structure beautifully stands out in the industrial surfaces of the venue. This new collection explores seamless integration of lighting to architecture via recessed and invisible components and perfects the control of dim-to-warm LEDs with smooth precision dimming.

Made of luminous double-walled glass orbs, to resemble grapes along a vine, houses a unique LED module that is looped and suspended from translucent electrical cords. Vitis is an achievement in lighting for atmosphere, sculptural form and translucent materiality unseen in any other product.
